definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Listening to the teacher worried of inquiry, leap or my sit at the same table told her reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 聽着閆老師着急的詢問，還是我的同桌告訴了她原委。

sentences.english: To understand why, there are a few things you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 要想知道事情的原委，有些事情你必須要瞭解。

sentences.english: Two people back home, Zhu Ma concerning things wrong.
sentences.chinese: 二人回家後，朱媽查問事情原委。

sentences.english: Until now, I do not really understand what happened with this event and why happened.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，我都沒有真正明白事情的原委。

sentences.english: A conscientious reporter should write any news story literally as it happened.
sentences.chinese: 有良知的記者應確實根據事實發生的原委寫新聞。

sentences.english: Jackie inquire the monica what happened, want to find father Fidel talk.
sentences.chinese: 傑姬問明瞭莫尼卡事情的原委，想找父親菲德爾談談。

sentences.english: Anyway, that was the official account of what happened.
sentences.chinese: 不管如何，那就是官方紀錄下的事件原委。

sentences.english: Exploring its cause, we can see the stability of army is one of the important factors that can't be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 考其原委，軍隊的穩定是不可忽視的重要因素之一。

definition: cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development
variant of 緣由|缘由[yuan2 you2]
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
sth one wishes to keep secret/ulterior motive/a subject best avoided
lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]
lit. to put everything out including the tray/to reveal everything/to make a clean breast of it all
